originalText.text:
5  star ++ for service and staff quality. Everybody is always friendly and makes you feel very comfortable.
Dr. Udo is a great doctor! He’s very understanding and listens to your concerns. He takes time with the patient to help them with their health issues! He is providing for our community. I have been visiting this clinic for years and I highly recommend Dr. Udo to anyone looking for a specialist. -Do not be discouraged and upset by the waiting time, sometimes it gets busy-

originalText.text:
I've been with Dr. Udo for about 3 years. He's attentive to his patients and takes time to listen to their concerns. In addition, Dr. Udo thoroughly explains results and answers any questions one may have.

The staff is kind and supportive.

Great place!

text.text:
I've been with Dr. Udo for about 3 years. He's attentive to his patients and takes time to listen to their concerns. In addition, Dr. Udo thoroughly explains results and answers any questions one may have.

The staff is kind and supportive.

Great place!

originalText.text: Each time be it  an available walk in or a scheduled appointment the staff smiles and verbally  greetings ! The waiting room; bathroom ; and exam rooms are professionals space . Staff are charming professionals who understand how to still be humans within their career environment . Dr.Udo is a professional , he speaks with you at low soft monotone (appreciated). He will take time with patients to ensure we comprehend what he’s explaining about our bodies ! Yes, I have and will continue to share his name and location.

originalText.text: Fast & Friendly service! I’ve been going to Dr. Udo for quite some time. The setting is clean, the staff are courteous, and Dr. Udo is caring, responsive, also has a great sense of humor! By far he is one of the best!

text.text: Fast & Friendly service! I’ve been going to Dr. Udo for quite some time. The setting is clean, the staff are courteous, and Dr. Udo is caring, responsive, also has a great sense of humor! By far he is one of the best!

originalText.text: My first time experience was great. The service was very professional and safe. The staff members very nice, caring and kind. The doctor was attentive and knowledgeable. I felt very comfortable talking about my needs and concerns. Doctor was very wise and understanding. I would like to say Thank You to all The staff members and Doctor for making me feel safe. I left feeling strong and positive about my decision. My overall experience was amazing
